title: Calibrate Content Response
description: Response payload with verdict and detailed explanations for collaborative calibration

oneOf.description: Success response with detailed calibration feedback

verdict.description: Overall pass/fail verdict for the content evaluation

explanation.description: Detailed natural language explanation of the decision

policy_alignment.description: How the content maps to specific policy criteria

matching_criteria.description: Policy statements that this content matches positively

violations.description: Policy violations found in the content

policy_text.description: The policy text that was violated

violation_reason.description: Explanation of how the content violates this policy

no_violations.description: True if no policy violations were found

feature_id.description: Which feature was evaluated (e.g., brand_safety, brand_suitability, competitor_adjacency)

explanation.description: Human-readable explanation of why this feature passed or failed

suggestion.description: Actionable suggestion for content that could meet this feature's requirements

errors.description: Field must not be present in success response

verdict.description: Field must not be present in error response
